ygData.subject: EQ Testing Procedure
ygData.msgSnippet: If you or anyone wants to post the idea on Sony s EQ message board go ahead. I m technically not even supposed to be using this email address (military) to
ygData.messageBody:
If you or anyone wants to post the idea on Sony's EQ message board go ahead.
I'm technically not even supposed to be using this email address (military)
to post on this list. Sure as hell don't want the address posted up on a
public message board. Uncle Sam may get the idea that I'm goofing off at
work:-)

Galtin of E'ci

> > characters. This scenario should alleviate any concerns of the regular
> Test
> > server players who earned there levels the regular way.
>
> That is a sweet idea, Gal. I would definitely suggest that and
> back you up on it.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
>
